availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edward Cummings (Kenton County, Kentucky, farmer and rail road contractor.)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, farmer and rail road contractor. Native of Ireland. Married to America Bradford Cummings in Pendleton County, Kentucky, on March 4, 1852. Father of William Cummings, Mary Cummings, and Walter Cummings. Contractor in Kenton County in 1860. Farmer in Kenton County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Fifth Ward, p. 709.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, p. 142A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Kenton County, KY, June and July 1863, p. 39.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Pendleton County Marriages, Film #000272800.
"Edward Cummings (1828-1894)," Find A Grave, Memorial #100869251, Accessed July 14, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/100869251/.
